t: Amazon Art Collective | Entertainment
s: Amazon Art Collective is an entertainment Company providing circus arts and choreographed shows in Sydney, Melbourne and QLD. We specialise in unique and elegant artistry including Aerials, fire performances, contemporary dance and martial artistry for powerful, purposeful productions.
